A children's book series featuring the mouse as a protagonist who goes on adventures in different shoes and learns valuable life lessons along the way.
A short film about the mouse's journey to find the perfect pair of shoes that fit him perfectly.
A playful take on the classic fairy tale "Cinderella," where the mouse is the protagonist who finds his true identity and happiness in a magical pair of shoes.
A podcast series where the mouse shares his knowledge and experiences about different types of shoes and their impact on the environment.
A collaborative project between a fashion designer and a shoe brand, where the mouse is the inspiration behind a new line of shoes that are both stylish and comfortable.
